directions: Place first 3 ingredients in heavy large Dutch oven. Pour water over. Bring to boil. Reduce heat and simmer until potatoes are tender, about 20 minutes. Stir in both cans of corn, cream and milk. Season with salt and pepper. Simmer 20 minutes. Add shrimp and cook until opaque, about 8 minutes. Garnish soup with chives.
ingredients: 1 pound russet potatoes, peeled and chopped
1 large red bell pepper, seeded and chopped
1/2 pound uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
title: Shrimp and Corn Chowder
